alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 5:02PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Essex and northeastern Middlesex Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 501 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Andover, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Lowell, Lawrence, Haverhill, Methuen, Billerica, Andover, Dracut, Tewksbury, North Andover, Wilmington, Ipswich, Georgetown, Boxford, Newbury, Groveland, Merrimac, Topsfield, Rowley and West Newbury. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Western Essex
